lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about the cyclist Floyd Landis, who is competing at the Tour of California in his first professional road race since being stripped of his 2006 Tour de France title, misstated the given name of a teammate in some editions. He is Brad White, not Mike. The article and a picture caption also misidentified, in some editions, the home country of Thor Hushovd, who won Tuesday’s stage of the Tour of California. It is Norway, not Sweden.
